reviewText: When I was a kid in the early nineties we had a Christian Bookstore where you could rent movies several blocks from my home. Papa Was a Preacher was an all time favorite with my family and we rented it whenever we got the chance. I've searched the internet up and down for years and have not found it anywhere. I would LOVE to have this family favorite once again in my home. LOVE this story!!!!

I took my whole family to see this movie in 1985. The theater was packed. Everyone loved it--many said it was the best movie they had EVER seen. It is unthinkable that it is now unavailable. If you find some copies somewhere, please post it here.

this movie is so great - i have memories watching it as a child and now i'm so disappointed to see it's not available to buy!  i can't find it anywhere, and i'd love to get it.  it's a wonderful family film.  bring it back, amazon!

Our children loved this movie growing up and they still repeat some of the lines!
Decent acting, totally wholesome for the family.
